messages.subtitle: Researches and good practices at JNU have found remarkable results in its outreach activities.
messages.title: Achievements

speech:
We at JNU, aim at the overall excellence of our students and staff. They are prepared to embark upon challenges in a meritorious and victorious manner and to outshine everyone that stands in their competition.                                                                          Some of the recent achievements are as follows:                                                                             1. Dr. Papia Sengupta, CPS, SSS has received Solidarity Award 2021 by AILA, Netherlands                                                                                                                                2. Prof. Babu Thaliath, CGS, SLL&CS nominated as Senior Fellow in University of Konstanz                                                                                                                                   
3. Prof. A.P. Dimri, SES has following contributions appeared in Science
